channel.title: Compiler Error?!@#@$%@?$!#@?$@
channel.description:
hey guys every time i try to compile my server it comes up with this:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/compiler.gif[/img]
can someone plz help me fix it, everything including run.exe works except for that!

item.title: Compiler Error?!@#@$%@?$!#@?$@
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

[quote=“king-of-pvp, post:4, topic:395929”]Edit your compiler and it might say:
(Change “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” to your java version
so go to mycomputer>localdisk(c:)>programfiles>java> and you should see 2 folders ‘jdk1.6.0_17’ and ‘jre6’ Depending on what java you have got now on the folder ‘jdk1.6.0_(#)’ Change the ‘#’ to your java version mine is 17 so mine is jdk.1.6.0_17 but say yours is 21 it will be jdk.1.6.0.21
Now you have found your java version you may now change the compiler to your java version:

= your java verison look above ^

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(#)\bin\javac” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause
exit

If you don’t have jdk you may download here: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html[/quote]

This sickens me people using like 5 lines for a compiler, you don’t even need two yet everyones using some piece of junk

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error?!@#@$%@?$!#@?$@
item.dc:creator: @king-of-pvp king-of-pvp
item.description:
@king-of-pvp wrote:

Edit your compiler and it might say:
(Change “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac” to your java version
so go to mycomputer>localdisk(c:)>programfiles>java> and you should see 2 folders ‘jdk1.6.0_17’ and ‘jre6’ Depending on what java you have got now on the folder ‘jdk1.6.0_(#)’ Change the ‘#’ to your java version mine is 17 so mine is jdk.1.6.0_17 but say yours is 21 it will be jdk.1.6.0.21
Now you have found your java version you may now change the compiler to your java version:

= your java verison look above ^

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_(#)\bin\javac” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause
exit

If you don’t have jdk you may download here: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error?!@#@$%@?$!#@?$@
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

a common mistake is that people dont have JDK or JRE. so make sure you have that downloaded. if thats not the problem. just right click on the compiler, and it will say like

“C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_[size=18pt]13[/size]/bin/javac.exe” *.java

and make sure you change the JDK number to yours. the updated one you should have is 25 so it should look like this

“C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_[size=18pt]25[/size]/bin/javac.exe” *.java

i hate waiting for answers just as much as the next person so if u need more help message me and ill teamview u through almost everything i know. -thanks @ terrellfisher@live.com

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error?!@#@$%@?$!#@?$@
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Post this here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Btw edit the compiler, delete everything, and put this in there:

@echo off :menu title Compiler @echo Compiling..... if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. pause exit

Read full topic
